title: march 5: working to end segregation (with Quinn XCII)
description:
Today on 365 days with mxmtoon, Maia talks about a landmark Supreme Court decision that was a huge part of ending school segregation. We also hear from a special musical guest, Quinn XCII! Join this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
